item.description:
FRI SEP 16 - AROUND THE WORLD IN 80 DAYS - Connecticut Theatre Group *ADV TIX DISCOUNT*

Adapted by Mark Brown from the novel by Jules Verne

Five actors use lightning fast costume changes to play all 39 characters in a madcap comedy that’s been called “Monty Python meets Jules Verne.” In 1872, Londoner Phileas Fogg wagers that he can circle the globe in just 80 days. With his fortune on the line, Fogg and his valet use rail, steamer, and elephant to race through India, Asia, and America.

 

Such challenges as a snooping detective, a possible human sacrifice, and a runaway train are met with Victorian virtue and a precision pocket watch. Drama Desk Award winner Russell Treyz directs this wacky adventure.

The New York Times hailed it as “fast-paced,” “unabashedly theatrical,” and “smart enough to make sophisticated adults laugh out loud and shamelessly silly enough to keep children in the audience interested and entertained.”

“Unabashedly theatrical…” - New York Times

Directed by Drama Desk Award Winner Russell Treyz

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Pre-Party starts at 6:30pm - Show starts at 8pm FREE SAFE PARKING

 

**RECEIVE A 20% DISCOUNT ON FOOD AND DRINK AT THE PRE-PARTY WITH YOUR TICKET**

Advance Tickets are $25 * Tickets are $30 at the event

 

Pick up your ticket before the show at the pre-Party with the Connecticut Theatre Group, or at the will call window

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP SECTION 9 THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

 

Visit www.CTTheatre.org or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your ticket before the show at the PREPARTY with the Connecticut Theatre Group, or at the will call window
